onbon.y2

Class Y2Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.Y2Controller

  • public class Y2Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller provides abstract functions to control full-color board of the Y2 series.
    Author:
    ONBON

        Returns:
